Race.SpecificTitle: Bogalusa School District -- Prop. #1 - 22.06 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(MILLAGE)
(PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  RENEWAL OF A 10-YEAR, 22.06-MILL PROPERTY TAX FOR GIVING ADDITIONAL SUPPORT FOR CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING, OPERATING AND IMPROVING THE PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS OF THE BOGALUSA SCHOOL DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall the Bogalusa School District of the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of twenty-two and six hundredths (22.06) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,498,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of giving additional support for constructing, maintaining, operating and improving the public elementary and secondary schools in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Bogalusa School District -- Prop. #2 - 3.11 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(MILLAGE)
(PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  RENEWAL OF A 10-YEAR, 3.11-MILL PROPERTY TAX FOR IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING SCHOOLS LOCATED IN THE BOGALUSA SCHOOL DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall the Bogalusa School District of the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of three and eleven hundredths (3.11) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $211,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating schools located in said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Bogalusa School District -- Prop. #3 - 7.76 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
(MILLAGE)
(PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  RENEWAL OF A 10-YEAR, 7.76-MILL PROPERTY TAX FOR THE BOGALUSA SCHOOL DISTRICT AS A SPECIAL TAX LEEWAY FOR MAINTENANCE.
Race.FullText: Shall the Bogalusa School District of the Parish of Washington, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of seven and seventy-six hundredths (7.76) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $527,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, as a special tax leeway for maintenance?
